DOC.detailed_description: Single center , prospective , randomize , intention-to-treat clinical trial . The study perform within two tier EMS system major city . Prehospital emergency physician scene every patient enrol study . Patients acute respiratory failure ( SaO2 < 90 % , respiratory rate > 20/min ) enrol study use envelope randomisation either `` conventional '' ( O2 + medication ) `` NIV . '' Vital sign document well venous blood gas take every 10 minute treatment start . Primary endpoint 28-day mortality , hospital- , ICU- respirator-days , SAPS , SOFA II complication . Secondary endpoint out-of-hospital incidence invasive ventilation , effect SpO2 , CO2 , respiratory rate , heart rate blood pressure .
